src_original: āha- yadetaduktaṃ bhagavatā saṃskṛtā dharmā utpadyante nirudhyante ca ityasya tathāgatabhāṣitasya ko 'bhiprāyaḥ?
tatra tathāgato mahākārūṇiko lokasya trāsapadaparihārārthaṃ vyavahāravaśāduktavān utpadyante nirudhyante ca /
atha khalu āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat- na bhagavan bodhisattvena atibahuṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitavyam /
eka eva dharmo bodhisattvena svārādhitaḥ kartavyaḥ supratibiddhaḥ /
tadyathā- yena rājñaścakravartinaścakraratnaṃ gacchati,  tena sarvabalakāyo gacchati /
evameva bhagavan yena bodhisattvasya mahākaruṇā gacchati,  tena sarve buddhadharmā gacchanti /
tadyathā bhagavan jīvitendriye sati anyeṣāmindriyāṇāṃ pravṛttirbhavati,
sā ca śūnyatā notpadyate na nirudhyate āha- yadi evaṃ sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā uktā bhagavatā,
